alumni.name: Zach Bessette
alumni.story: Looking back, what I value most was how the Saint Stephen's faculty fostered my curiosity and encouraged me to discover my interests. They didn't just want me to memorize facts - they wanted me to ask questions, challenge assumptions, and discover how to learn independently. That mindset has been crucial for my success in the tech industry.
alumni.quote: The Saint Stephen's faculty fostered my curiosity and encouraged me to discover my interests.

alumni.name: Jennifer Boothby
alumni.story: I'm still realizing how unique my experience was at Saint Stephen's. I've always credited my love of science to my incredible teachers at SSES. I can talk about instances where the teachers went above and beyond to help nurture my curiosity.
alumni.quote: I've always credited my love of science to my incredible teachers at SSES.

alumni.name: Chase Brown
alumni.story: The focus on academics and the relationships I built at Saint Stephen's were priceless. My leadership skills, work ethic, my whole mindset started at SSES.
alumni.quote: My leadership skills, work ethic, my whole mindset started at SSES.

alumni.name: Sydney Brown
alumni.story: The teachers and coaches poured into me at Saint Stephen's. It changed my life. I wouldn't be the man I am today without Saint Stephen's.
alumni.quote: I wouldn't be the man I am today without Saint Stephen's.

alumni.name: Dr. Janelle Coutts
alumni.story: The passion of my AP chemistry teacher inspired my love of the subject and led me down the path of pursuing it as a career. Without the dedication Saint Stephen's puts into allowing their teachers to be the best at teaching and passion to develop students, I don't think I would have ended up where I am now.
alumni.quote: Without the dedication Saint Stephen's puts into allowing their teachers to be the best at teaching, I don't think I would have ended up where I am now.

alumni.name: Natalie Haschek
alumni.story: The faculty at Saint Stephen's had a profound impact on my learning and development. I will be forever grateful for their wisdom and guidance that helped instill in me a sense of curiosity about the world.
alumni.quote: I will be forever grateful for their wisdom and guidance that helped instill in me a sense of curiosity.

alumni.name: Dr. Sharif Hassan
alumni.story: Saint Stephen's was the foundation that enabled me to effectively take on life's future academic endeavors.
alumni.quote: Saint Stephen's was the foundation that enabled me to effectively take on life's future academic endeavors.

alumni.name: Qing 'Sunny' Jin
alumni.story: I still remember all the inspiring talks, unwavering support, and extra help I received from the Saint Stephen's faculty. They helped me grow into a more confident person and ultimately, adapt to American culture.
alumni.quote: They helped me grow into a more confident person and ultimately, adapt to American culture.

alumni.name: Jason Kaplan
alumni.story: The years I spent at Saint Stephen's were the most formative of my life. The impact the teachers had on me is incalculable and the friendships I made still endure as the greatest I have ever had.
alumni.quote: The impact the teachers had on me is incalculable.

alumni.name: Catherine Van Keuren
alumni.story: Even though I wasn't initially planning on working in tech when I was in high school, I'm grateful for the incredible math and science teachers I had at SSES. The rigor of the STEM curriculum prepared me tremendously for the challenges I faced while completing my degree at one of the top universities for computer science. I'm thankful to Saint Stephen's for setting me up for success and shaping me into the person I am today.
alumni.quote: The rigor of the STEM curriculum prepared me tremendously for the challenges I faced.

alumni.name: Dr. Bryant Kirkland
alumni.story: The faculty taught me to avoid being too rigid in developing a world-view. Decades later, I recognize that some of my first encounters with big ideas about politics, art, identity, and the meaning of community took root at Saint Stephen's. I strive to model for my students the same openness and curiosity that the faculty at SSES showed me.
alumni.quote: I strive to model for my students the same openness and curiosity that the faculty at SSES showed me.

alumni.name: Conner Lynch
alumni.story: Saint Stephen's gave me the tools to succeed at the highest academic levels, which prepared me for a rewarding career. The most important thing I came out of SSES with was knowing the importance of being a lifelong learner.
alumni.quote: The most important thing I came out of SSES with was knowing the importance of being a lifelong learner.

alumni.name: Ben Petlock
alumni.position: Foreign Agricultural Affairs, U.S. Department of Agriculture
alumni.story: My time at Saint Stephen's was incredibly fulfilling and remains valuable. My favorite thing was the strong community I was able to build there and the many friends and mentors which remain a central part of my life today.
alumni.quote: My favorite thing was the strong community I was able to build there.

alumni.name: Kaelan Richards
alumni.position: Former White House Senior Regional Communications Director, CEO and founder of Compass Rose Communications
alumni.story: Saint Stephen's prepared me to succeed in college and beyond - from politics to tech to starting my own company.
alumni.quote: Saint Stephen's prepared me to succeed in college and beyond - from politics to tech to starting my own company.

alumni.name: Rob Sanford
alumni.position: Circuit Court Judge, Wyoming's Second Judicial District
alumni.story: I attended great colleges after Saint Stephen's - outstanding professors, talented coaches, competitive athletics and rigorous academics. But nothing compares to the deep impact SSES had on me. It taught me more about myself and the world's possibilities than any other school experience.
alumni.quote: Nothing compares to the deep impact SSES had on me.

alumni.name: Drew Vigne
alumni.story: Looking back, my senior year IQ class at Saint Stephen's really stands out. Designing and building bridges was not only a fun challenge but also a pivotal moment that sparked my passion for design engineering. SSES creates opportunities for students to discover their interests and passions in a way that has a lasting impact.
alumni.quote: SSES creates opportunities for students to discover their interests and passions in a way that has a lasting impact.
